edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.sensorymotormemory
Interface SensoryMotorMemory

All Superinterfaces:
FrameworkModule, FullyInitializable, Initializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
BasicSensoryMotorMemory
public interface SensoryMotorMemory
extends FrameworkModule

Sensory Motor Memory is a module which receives selected actions from ActionSelection and content from SensoryMemory. It contains the algorithm for a selected action. When it executes an algorithm it directly calls a method in the environment (doesn't use a listener).

Author:
Ryan J McCall, Javier Snaider
